alert.note: Alert for New Castle (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 11:29AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern New Castle, northwestern Talbot, Queen Anne`s and Kent Counties through NOON EDT... At 1129 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Barksdale to near Betterton to Romancoke. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Newark, Middletown, Centerville, Talbot, Elsmere, New Castle, Chestertown, Centreville, Delaware City, Rock Hall, Newport, St. Michaels, Church Hill, Millington, Sudlersville, Betterton, Old Town, Grasonville and Stanton. This includes Interstate 95 in Delaware between mile markers 1 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EDT for northern Delaware...and eastern and northeastern Maryland.
